name: BartendHelper
0:
”Alexa, ask bartend helper how to make a martini”
”Alexa, ask bartend helper what do I need for a manhattan”
”Alexa, ask bartend helper what should I drink”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bartend helper
des: With the Bartender Helper you are able to ask how to make a large list of drinks. Simply ask what to make or ask what you should make. The bartender will help you by choosing a drink for you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
